about.me: NORTH is a well-established stake pool built for the community, by the community. The SPOs are two childhood friends with an enormous passion for the blockchain. Over 10 000 people have put their trust in NORTH, for a good reason. Delegating with NORTH, you can rest assured your vote is in one of the best stake pools in the network. For questions, join our telegram channel https://t.me/n0rdicp00l
about.server: Powerful hardware is prioritized higher than low costs. Servers are running both locally and in the cloud, combining the best of two worlds. All sensitive keys is stored and handled on a dedicated offline computer, ensuring complete safety of the pool.
